content: HIT-HY 270 Adhesive anchor Ultimate-performance injectable hybrid mortar with approvals for fastening in all masonry materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features ICC-ES masonry approval and technical data that allows high application flexibility HIT-SC composite sleeves offer greater flexibility through use of multiple sleeve combinations and also minimize mortar wastage by allowing more accurate dosing in hollow base materials Provides strong, reliable and easily installed fastenings in a variety of masonry base materials Fastenings in masonry can be designed using the new masonry design software which is part of PROFIS Anchor Performs reliably, even when the size and location of bricks and voids are unknown Applications Fastenings in hollow and solid masonry Refurbishments and renovations Heavy bracing of items such as sun shades on insulated materials Structural strengthening of old masonry walls Glass balustrade assemblies For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (multi wythe brick/unreinforced masonry), Masonry (solid) Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Seismic IBC compliance: IBC 2006, IBC 2009, IBC 2012, IBC 2015 Technical Data | Base materials | Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (multi wythe brick/unreinforced masonry), Masonry (solid) | Base material condition (as per approval) | Dry, Wet | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Seismic | IBC compliance | IBC 2006, IBC 2009, IBC 2012, IBC 2015 | Seismic loading | Yes | PROFIS Software | No | Anchoring elements | HAS threaded rods, HIS-N internally threaded sleeves, HIT-SC mesh sleeves, HIT-S mesh sleeves, Rebar | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 176 °F | Free of styrene | Yes | Type of fixing (global) | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 2194247 - INJECTABLE MORTAR HIT-HY 270 (11.1OZ/330ML) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil pack - 1x Mixer - 1x Mixer extension - 3580725 - HIT-HY 270 (11.1OZ/330ML) 1 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x Foil pack - 25x Mixer - 25x Mixer extension - 3786247 - HY270 11.1OZ/330ML (1MC)+HDE 22V/BLK Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDE 500-22 HNA Cordl. dispenser assy - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 25x Foil pack - 25x Mixer -
